summary: This mod changes the interior of the Riverwood Trader, it looks more cleaner and adds one bed ;)))
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod which it basically removes all clutter in Riverwood Trader so you don't run into a table, Enhanced upstairs of the building. I am still working on it there will be a V2 up soon, I hope!
The mod also adds 3 new characters, one of them is a dog that you can make a follower(Jessie), another is Mathius he is a prison escapee that needs your help (Follower). One is just a innocent child that may have Braith's voice and dialogue!
Followers (Jessie, Mathius) are at The Sleeping Giant Inn and the kid is in Riverwood Trader.
The followers never die, they just get knocked to the ground just set there HP ingame by Setav Health (Amount)

Mod to Enhance Riverwood Trader.
Known Bugs:
1. Lighting
2. Followers (Animals) Don't follow you up stairs.
3. Spawn in front of the vendor or upstairs.

Edit: It appears many of these bugs aren't a problem anymore.Â
author: GummyAU
